org.h2.jaqu
Class Define

java.lang.Object
  org.h2.jaqu.Define

public class Define
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides utility methods to define primary keys, indexes, and set the name of the table.

tableName

public static void tableName(GeneratorType genType,
                             java.lang.String sequenceName)
Use this method to set the GenerationType of the table/ object!
GenerationType.NONE, GenerationType.IDENTITY, GenerationType.SEQUENCE

Parameters:
genType -
sequenceName -

tableName

public static void tableName(java.lang.String tableName,
                             GeneratorType genType,
                             java.lang.String sequenceName)
Use this method if table name in the DB is different then the object's name, when there is a sequence or identity generation type for primary key.

Note: IDENTITY and SEQUENCE are supported provided that the underlying DB supports the following calls:

  1. for sequence- select [sequenceName].nextval from dual
  2. for identity - CALL IDENTITY()

Parameters:
tableName - - if null the name of the class is used for table name
genType - - the primary key generation type. If null, GenerationType.NONE is used
sequenceName - - the name of the sequence to use. Use only when genType is sequence, other wise disregarded.
